name: God Said Destroy The World!
description:
It's a simple idle clicker game. You only need to click or wait. It's simple as pie.

One special feature of this game, it is all asset you can see is created by LT. Lemco myself and Unity engine basic UI asset.

IF YOU ONLY WANT TO PLAY THE ENDING, PLEASE click SPACE BAR 100 TIMES

Design & Explain You are The World

In this "jam focus" thing, I play a little word game on it. In Some myth, the world is the god. So, I decided to let player be the god(without almost power).

One Player Multiplayer

It's mean single player and can control everything in the game. 

As you see, although power have some limitation on it, you still can do everything to destroy the Earth.

For some explaining of the rock spawning, when player click the object(Moon), you are separate a rock from it.
